clinical_study.brief_title: Nasal Intubation：a Comparison of Different Endotracheal Tubes
clinical_study.official_title: Compare the Effects of Two Different Endotracheal Tubes on The Secretion and Bleeding Volume of Patients During Intubation to Facilitate Nasotracheal Tube Advancement Into Trachea Under Video-laryngoscope

lead_sponsor.agency: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Either uses two different endotracheal tubes to pass the nasal cavity and to compare the effects on the secretion and bleeding volume of patients during intubation to facilitate nasotracheal tube advancement.

detailed_description.textblock:
1. Assess the patient's airway before intubation. EKG, blood pressure and SPO2 are monitored during the process.
2. Randomly divided into two groups：Henan Tuoren Endotracheal Tube and Smiths Portex Tracheal tubes.
3. Sedation process：Give Fentanyl 1 ug/kg according to the patient's weight via IV.
4. Give 1.5ml of Lidocaine without Epinephrine and 0.5ml of Lidocaine with Epinephrine to reduce intranasal bleeding.
5. Sedative injection：give Fentanyl 1ug/kg + Thiamylal 5mg/kg + Rocuronium 1mg/kg
6. Anesthesia intubation inducer：Propofol 1mg/kg
7. Intubation
8. Record the bleeding of the oropharyngeal and nasal mucosa、intubation time、Intubation Difficult Scale (IDS score) and number of intubations during intubation.
9. Record oropharynx、nostril and oropharynx bleeding in 3 minutes after completion of intubation.
10. Evaluate the patient's sore throat, hoarse voice, dysphagia, nasal congestion, nose bleeding, and nasal pain every other day.

primary_outcome.description: success rate of tube advancement and successful first tube attempt success rate of tube passing through nasal cavity into trachea
time taken in tube advancement time taken in tube advancement from nostril into trachea in each time interval

secondary_outcome.description: post-intubation induced hoarseness and sore throat intubation related hoarseness and sorethroat at post-anesthesia care unit and the next coming morning

arm_group.description: Uses the Henan Tuoren endotracheal tube to assist the nasal tracheal tube passing the nasal cavity, oropharynx and advanced into the trachea
Uses the Smiths Portex endotracheal tube to assist the nasal tracheal tube passing the nasal cavity, oropharynx and advanced into the trachea

intervention.description: The endotracheal tube is used under the direct view of the electronic imaging laryngoscope.
The endotracheal tube is used under the direct view of the electronic imaging laryngoscope.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age:20-65 years
- Undergoing oro-maxillofacial surgery
- Opening mouth > 3 cm
- Denied any systemic disease.
- American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) class:I-III
Exclusion Criteria:
- Difficult airway assessed (limited mouth opening, limited neck motion, and thyromental distance < 6cm)
- Previous head and neck surgery history
- Upper abnormal airway diagnosed
- Easily epistaxis
- Both sides nasal cavities obstruction

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Anesthesiology, Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital

facility.name: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital
